module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.eql

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.eql (matrix, precision)

  • description and source-code
    eql = function (matrix, precision) {
	var M = matrix.elements || matrix;
	if (typeof(M[0][0]) == 'undefined') { M = Matrix.create(M).elements; }
	if (this.elements.length != M.length ||
        this.elements[0].length != M[0].length) { return false; }
	var i = this.elements.length, nj = this.elements[0].length, j;
	while (i--) { j = nj;
		      while (j--) {
			  if (Math.abs(this.elements[i][j] - M[i][j]) > (precision || Sylvester.precision)) { return false; }
		      }
		    }
	return true;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.forwardSubstitute

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.forwardSubstitute (b)

  • description and source-code
    forwardSubstitute = function (b) {
	var xa = [];

	for(var i = 1; i <= this.rows(); i++) {
	    var w = 0;

	    for(var j = 1; j < i; j++) {
		w += this.e(i, j) * xa[j - 1];
	    }

	    xa.push((b.e(i) - w) / this.e(i, i));
	}

	return $V(xa);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.indexOf

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.indexOf (x)

  • description and source-code
    indexOf = function (x) {
	var index = null, ni = this.elements.length, i, nj = this.elements[0].length, j;
	for (i = 0; i < ni; i++) {
	    for (j = 0; j < nj; j++) {
		if (this.elements[i][j] == x) { return {i: i + 1, j: j + 1}; }
	    }
	}
	return null;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inspect

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inspect ()

  • description and source-code
    inspect = function () {
	var matrix_rows = [];
	var n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    matrix_rows.push($V(this.elements[i]).inspect());
	}
	return matrix_rows.join('\n');
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inv

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inv ()

  • description and source-code
    inv = function () { return this.inverse(); }
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inverse

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.inverse ()

  • description and source-code
    inverse = function () {
	if (!this.isSquare() || this.isSingular()) { return null; }
	var n = this.elements.length, i = n, j;
	var M = this.augment(Matrix.I(n)).toRightTriangular();
	var np = M.elements[0].length, p, els, divisor;
	var inverse_elements = [], new_element;
	// Matrix is non-singular so there will be no zeros on the diagonal
	// Cycle through rows from last to first
	while (i--) {
	    // First, normalise diagonal elements to 1
	    els = [];
	    inverse_elements[i] = [];
	    divisor = M.elements[i][i];
	    for (p = 0; p < np; p++) {
    new_element = M.elements[i][p] / divisor;
		els.push(new_element);
		// Shuffle off the current row of the right hand side into the results
		// array as it will not be modified by later runs through this loop
		if (p >= n) { inverse_elements[i].push(new_element); }
	    }
	    M.elements[i] = els;
	    // Then, subtract this row from those above it to
	    // give the identity matrix on the left hand side
	    j = i;
	    while (j--) {
		els = [];
		for (p = 0; p < np; p++) {
		    els.push(M.elements[j][p] - M.elements[i][p] * M.elements[j][i]);
		}
		M.elements[j] = els;
	    }
	}
	return Matrix.create(inverse_elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.isSameSizeAs

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.isSameSizeAs (matrix)

  • description and source-code
    isSameSizeAs = function (matrix) {
	var M = matrix.elements || matrix;
	if (typeof(M[0][0]) == 'undefined') { M = Matrix.create(M).elements; }
	return (this.elements.length == M.length &&
		this.elements[0].length == M[0].length);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.isSingular

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.isSingular ()

  • description and source-code
    isSingular = function () {
	return (this.isSquare() && this.determinant() === 0);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.isSquare

  • description and source-code
    isSquare = function () {
	return (this.elements.length == this.elements[0].length);
}
  • example usage

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.log

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.log ()

  • description and source-code
    log = function () {
	return this.map(function(x) { return Math.log(x); });
}
  • example usage

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.luJs

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.luJs ()

  • description and source-code
    function luJs() {
    var A = this.dup();
    var L = Matrix.I(A.rows());
    var P = Matrix.I(A.rows());
    var U = Matrix.Zeros(A.rows(), A.cols());
    var p = 1;

    for(var k = 1; k <= Math.min(A.cols(), A.rows()); k++) {
	P = A.partialPivot(k, p, P, A, L);
	
	for(var i = k + 1; i <= A.rows(); i++) {
	    var l = A.e(i, p) / A.e(k, p);
	    L.elements[i - 1][k - 1] = l;
	
	    for(var j = k + 1 ; j <= A.cols(); j++) {
		A.elements[i - 1][j - 1] -= A.e(k, j) * l;
	    }
	}
	
	for(var j = k; j <= A.cols(); j++) {
	    U.elements[k - 1][j - 1] = A.e(k, j);
	}

	if(p < A.cols())
	    p++;
    }

    return {L: L, U: U, P: P};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.luPack

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.luPack ()

  • description and source-code
    function luPack() {
    var lu = lapack.lu(this.elements);
    return {
	L: $M(lu.L),
	U: $M(lu.U),
	P: $M(lu.P)
	// don't pass back IPIV
    };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.map

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.map (fn)

  • description and source-code
    map = function (fn) {
var els = [], i = this.elements.length, nj = this.elements[0].length, j;
	while (i--) { j = nj;
		      els[i] = [];
		      while (j--) {
			  els[i][j] = fn(this.elements[i][j], i + 1, j + 1);
		      }
		    }
	return Matrix.create(els);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.max

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.max ()

  • description and source-code
    max = function () {
	var m = 0, i = this.elements.length, nj = this.elements[0].length, j;
	while (i--) {
	    j = nj;
	    while (j--) {
		if (Math.abs(this.elements[i][j]) > Math.abs(m)) { m = this.elements[i][j]; }
	    }
	}
	return m;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxColumnIndexes

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxColumnIndexes ()

  • description and source-code
    maxColumnIndexes = function () {
	var maxes = [];

	for(var i = 1; i <= this.rows(); i++) {
	    var max = null;
	    var maxIndex = -1;

	    for(var j = 1; j <= this.cols(); j++) {
		if(max === null || this.e(i, j) > max) {
		    max = this.e(i, j);
		    maxIndex = j;
		}
	    }

	    maxes.push(maxIndex);
	}

	return $V(maxes);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxColumns

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxColumns ()

  • description and source-code
    maxColumns = function () {
	var maxes = [];

	for(var i = 1; i <= this.rows(); i++) {
	    var max = null;

	    for(var j = 1; j <= this.cols(); j++) {
		if(max === null || this.e(i, j) > max) {
		    max = this.e(i, j);
		}
	    }

	    maxes.push(max);
	}

	return $V(maxes);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxIndex

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.maxIndex ()

  • description and source-code
    maxIndex = function () {
    var m = 0,
    i = this.elements.length,
    nj = this.elements[0].length,
    j;

    var maxI = -1;
    var maxJ = -1;
    while (i--) {
        j = nj;
        while (j--) {
            if (Math.abs(this.elements[i][j]) > Math.abs(m)) {
                m = this.elements[i][j];
                maxI = i + 1;
                maxJ = j + 1;
            }
        }
    }

    return { value: m, row: maxI, col: maxJ };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.mean

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.mean ()

  • description and source-code
    mean = function () {
  var dim = this.dimensions();
  var r = [];
  for (var i = 1; i <= dim.cols; i++) {
    r.push(this.col(i).sum() / dim.rows);
  }
  return $V(r);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minColumnIndexes

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minColumnIndexes ()

  • description and source-code
    minColumnIndexes = function () {
	var mins = [];

	for(var i = 1; i <= this.rows(); i++) {
	    var min = null;
	    var minIndex = -1;

	    for(var j = 1; j <= this.cols(); j++) {
		if(min === null || this.e(i, j) < min) {
		    min = this.e(i, j);
		    minIndex = j;
		}
	    }

	    mins.push(minIndex);
	}

	return $V(mins);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minColumns

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minColumns ()

  • description and source-code
    minColumns = function () {
	var mins = [];

	for(var i = 1; i <= this.rows(); i++) {
	    var min = null;

	    for(var j = 1; j <= this.cols(); j++) {
		if(min === null || this.e(i, j) < min) {
		    min = this.e(i, j);
		}
	    }

	    mins.push(min);
	}

	return $V(mins);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minor

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.minor (a, b, c, d)

  • description and source-code
    minor = function (a, b, c, d) {
	var elements = [], ni = c, i, nj, j;
	var rows = this.elements.length, cols = this.elements[0].length;
	while (ni--) {
	    i = c - ni - 1;
	    elements[i] = [];
	    nj = d;
	    while (nj--) {
		j = d - nj - 1;
		elements[i][j] = this.elements[(a + i - 1) % rows][(b + j - 1) % cols];
	    }
	}
	return Matrix.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.mulOp

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.mulOp (matrix, op)

  • description and source-code
    mulOp = function (matrix, op) {
	if (!matrix.elements) {
	    return this.map(function(x) { return op(x, matrix); });
	}

	var returnVector = matrix.modulus ? true : false;
	var M = matrix.elements || matrix;
	if (typeof(M[0][0]) == 'undefined')
	    M = Matrix.create(M).elements;
	if (!this.canMultiplyFromLeft(M))
	    return null;
	var e = this.elements, rowThis, rowElem, elements = [],
    sum, m = e.length, n = M[0].length, o = e[0].length, i = m, j, k;

	while (i--) {
        rowElem = [];
        rowThis = e[i];
        j = n;

        while (j--) {
		sum = 0;
		k = o;

		while (k--) {
                sum += op(rowThis[k], M[k][j]);
		}

		rowElem[j] = sum;
        }

        elements[i] = rowElem;
	}

	var M = Matrix.create(elements);
	return returnVector ? M.col(1) : M;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.multiply

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.multiply (matrix)

  • description and source-code
    multiply = function (matrix) {
	return this.mulOp(matrix, function(x, y) { return x * y});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.partialPivot

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.partialPivot (k, j, P, A, L)

  • description and source-code
    partialPivot = function (k, j, P, A, L) {
	var maxIndex = 0;
	var maxValue = 0;

	for(var i = k; i <= A.rows(); i++) {
	    if(Math.abs(A.e(i, j)) > maxValue) {
		maxValue = Math.abs(A.e(k, j));
		maxIndex = i;
	    }
	}

	if(maxIndex != k) {
	    var tmp = A.elements[k - 1];
	    A.elements[k - 1] = A.elements[maxIndex - 1];
	    A.elements[maxIndex - 1] = tmp;
	
	    P.elements[k - 1][k - 1] = 0;
	    P.elements[k - 1][maxIndex - 1] = 1;
	    P.elements[maxIndex - 1][maxIndex - 1] = 0;
	    P.elements[maxIndex - 1][k - 1] = 1;
	}
	
	return P;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.pcaProject

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.pcaProject (k, U)

  • description and source-code
    pcaProject = function (k, U) {
	var U = U || pca(this).U;
	var Ureduce= U.slice(1, U.rows(), 1, k);
	return {Z: this.x(Ureduce), U: U};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.pcaRecover

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.pcaRecover (U)

  • description and source-code
    pcaRecover = function (U) {
	var k = this.cols();
	var Ureduce = U.slice(1, U.rows(), 1, k);
	return this.x(Ureduce.transpose());
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.qrJs

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.qrJs ()

  • description and source-code
    function qrJs() {
    var m = this.rows();
    var n = this.cols();
    var Q = Matrix.I(m);
    var A = this;

    for(var k = 1; k < Math.min(m, n); k++) {
	var ak = A.slice(k, 0, k, k).col(1);
	var oneZero = [1];
	
	while(oneZero.length <=  m - k)
	    oneZero.push(0);
	
	oneZero = $V(oneZero);
	var vk = ak.add(oneZero.x(ak.norm() * Math.sign(ak.e(1))));
	var Vk = $M(vk);
	var Hk = Matrix.I(m - k + 1).subtract(Vk.x(2).x(Vk.transpose()).div(Vk.transpose().x(Vk).e(1, 1)));
	var Qk = identSize(Hk, m, n, k);
	A = Qk.x(A);
	// slow way to compute Q
	Q = Q.x(Qk);
    }

    return {Q: Q, R: A};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.qrPack

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.qrPack ()

  • description and source-code
    function qrPack() {
    var qr = lapack.qr(this.elements);

    return {
	Q: $M(qr.Q),
	R: $M(qr.R)
    };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.rank

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.rank ()

  • description and source-code
    rank = function () {
	var M = this.toRightTriangular(), rank = 0;
	var i = this.elements.length, nj = this.elements[0].length, j;
	while (i--) {
	    j = nj;
	    while (j--) {
		if (Math.abs(M.elements[i][j]) > Sylvester.precision) { rank++; break; }
	    }
	}
	return rank;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    rk = function () { return this.rank(); }
  • example usage

	return this.map(function(x) { return Math.round(x); });
}

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.row (i)

    row = function (i) {
	if (i > this.elements.length) { return null; }
	return $V(this.elements[i - 1]);
}
  • example usage

	return this.elements.length;
}

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.setElements

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.setElements (els)

  • description and source-code
    setElements = function (els) {
	var i, j, elements = els.elements || els;
	if (typeof(elements[0][0]) != 'undefined') {
	    i = elements.length;
	    this.elements = [];
	    while (i--) {
		j = elements[i].length;
		this.elements[i] = [];
		while (j--) {
		    this.elements[i][j] = elements[i][j];
		}
	    }
	    return this;
	}
	var n = elements.length;
	this.elements = [];
	for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    this.elements.push([elements[i]]);
	}
	return this;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.slice

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.slice (startRow, endRow, startCol, endCol)

  • description and source-code
    slice = function (startRow, endRow, startCol, endCol) {
	var x = [];
	
	if(endRow == 0)
	    endRow = this.rows();
	
	if(endCol == 0)
	    endCol = this.cols();

	for(i = startRow; i <= endRow; i++) {
	    var row = [];

	    for(j = startCol; j <= endCol; j++) {
		row.push(this.e(i, j));
	    }

	    x.push(row);
	}

	return $M(x);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.snapTo

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.snapTo (x)

  • description and source-code
    snapTo = function (x) {
	return this.map(function(p) {
	    return (Math.abs(p - x) <= Sylvester.precision) ? x : p;
	});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.solve

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.solve (b)

  • description and source-code
    solve = function (b) {
	var lu = this.lu();
	b = lu.P.x(b);
	var y = lu.L.forwardSubstitute(b);
	var x = lu.U.backSubstitute(y);
	return lu.P.x(x);
	//return this.inv().x(b);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.std

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.std ()

  • description and source-code
    std = function () {
    var dim = this.dimensions();
    var mMean = this.mean();
    var r = [];
    for (var i = 1; i <= dim.cols; i++) {
        var meanDiff = this.col(i).subtract(mMean.e(i));
        meanDiff = meanDiff.elementMultiply(meanDiff);
        r.push(Math.sqrt(meanDiff.sum() / dim.rows));
    }
    return $V(r);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.subtract

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.subtract (matrix)

  • description and source-code
    subtract = function (matrix) {
	if(typeof(matrix) == 'number') {
	    return this.map(function(x, i, j) { return x - matrix});
	} else {
	    var M = matrix.elements || matrix;
	    if (typeof(M[0][0]) == 'undefined') { M = Matrix.create(M).elements; }
	    if (!this.isSameSizeAs(M)) { return null; }
	    return this.map(function(x, i, j) { return x - M[i - 1][j - 1]; });
	}
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.sum

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.sum ()

  • description and source-code
    sum = function () {
    var sum = 0;

    this.map(function(x) { sum += x;});

    return sum;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.svdJs

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.svdJs ()

  • description and source-code
    function svdJs() {
    var A = this;
    var V = Matrix.I(A.rows());
    var S = A.transpose();
    var U = Matrix.I(A.cols());
    var err = Number.MAX_VALUE;
    var i = 0;
    var maxLoop = 100;

    while(err > 2.2737e-13 && i < maxLoop) {
        var qr = S.transpose().qrJs();
        S = qr.R;
        V = V.x(qr.Q);
        qr = S.transpose().qrJs();
        U = U.x(qr.Q);
        S = qr.R;

        var e = S.triu(1).unroll().norm();
        var f = S.diagonal().norm();

        if(f == 0)
            f = 1;

        err = e / f;

        i++;
    }

    var ss = S.diagonal();
    var s = [];

    for(var i = 1; i <= ss.cols(); i++) {
        var ssn = ss.e(i);
        s.push(Math.abs(ssn));

        if(ssn < 0) {
            for(var j = 0; j < U.rows(); j++) {
                V.elements[j][i - 1] = -(V.elements[j][i - 1]);
            }
        }
    }

    return {U: U, S: $V(s).toDiagonalMatrix(), V: V};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.svdPack

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.svdPack ()

  • description and source-code
    function svdPack() {
    var result = lapack.sgesvd('A', 'A', this.elements);

    return {
        U: $M(result.U),
        S: $M(result.S).column(1).toDiagonalMatrix(),
	V: $M(result.VT).transpose()
    };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toArray

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toArray ()

  • description and source-code
    toArray = function () {
	var matrix_rows = [];
	var n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    matrix_rows.push(this.elements[i]);
	}
  return matrix_rows;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toRightTriangular

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toRightTriangular ()

  • description and source-code
    toRightTriangular = function () {
	var M = this.dup(), els;
	var n = this.elements.length, i, j, np = this.elements[0].length, p;
	for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    if (M.elements[i][i] == 0) {
		for (j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
		    if (M.elements[j][i] != 0) {
			els = [];
			for (p = 0; p < np; p++) { els.push(M.elements[i][p] + M.elements[j][p]); }
			M.elements[i] = els;
			break;
		    }
		}
	    }
	    if (M.elements[i][i] != 0) {
		for (j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
		    var multiplier = M.elements[j][i] / M.elements[i][i];
		    els = [];
		    for (p = 0; p < np; p++) {
			// Elements with column numbers up to an including the number
			// of the row that we're subtracting can safely be set straight to
			// zero, since that's the point of this routine and it avoids having
			// to loop over and correct rounding errors later
			els.push(p <= i ? 0 : M.elements[j][p] - M.elements[i][p] * multiplier);
		    }
		    M.elements[j] = els;
		}
	    }
	}
	return M;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toUpperTriangular

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.toUpperTriangular ()

  • description and source-code
    toUpperTriangular = function () { return this.toRightTriangular(); }
  • example usage
    n/a

    tr = function () { return this.trace(); }
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.trace

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.trace ()

  • description and source-code
    trace = function () {
	if (!this.isSquare()) { return null; }
	var tr = this.elements[0][0], n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 1; i < n; i++) {
	    tr += this.elements[i][i];
	}
	return tr;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.transpose

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.transpose ()

  • description and source-code
    transpose = function () {
var rows = this.elements.length, i, cols = this.elements[0].length, j;
	var elements = [], i = cols;
	while (i--) {
	    j = rows;
	    elements[i] = [];
	    while (j--) {
		elements[i][j] = this.elements[j][i];
	    }
	}
	return Matrix.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.triu

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.triu (k)

  • description and source-code
    triu = function (k) {
	if(!k)
	    k = 0;
	
	return this.map(function(x, i, j) {
	    return j - i >= k ? x : 0;
	});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Matrix.prototype.unroll

function salient.math.Matrix.prototype.unroll ()

  • description and source-code
    unroll = function () {
	var v = [];
	
	for(var i = 1; i <= this.cols(); i++) {
	    for(var j = 1; j <= this.rows(); j++) {
		v.push(this.e(j, i));
	    }
	}

	return $V(v);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    return Vector.create(elements);
}

module salient.math.Vector.prototype

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.add (value)

  • description and source-code
    add = function (value) {
	var V = value.elements || value;

	if (this.elements.length != V.length)
	    return this.map(function(v) { return v + value });
	else
	    return this.map(function(x, i) { return x + V[i - 1]; });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.angleFrom (vector)

  • description and source-code
    angleFrom = function (vector) {
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	var n = this.elements.length, k = n, i;
	if (n != V.length) { return null; }
	var dot = 0, mod1 = 0, mod2 = 0;
	// Work things out in parallel to save time
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    dot += x * V[i - 1];
	    mod1 += x * x;
	    mod2 += V[i - 1] * V[i - 1];
	});
	mod1 = Math.sqrt(mod1); mod2 = Math.sqrt(mod2);
	if (mod1 * mod2 === 0) { return null; }
	var theta = dot / (mod1 * mod2);
	if (theta < -1) { theta = -1; }
	if (theta > 1) { theta = 1; }
	return Math.acos(theta);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.augment (elements)

  • description and source-code
    augment = function (elements) {
	var newElements = this.elements;

	for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
	    newElements.push(elements[i]);
	}

	return Vector.create(newElements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.chomp (n)

  • description and source-code
    chomp = function (n) {
	var elements = [];

	for (var i = n; i < this.elements.length; i++) {
	    elements.push(this.elements[i]);
	}

	return Vector.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.cols ()

  • description and source-code
    cols = function () {
  return this.elements.length;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.cross (vector)

  • description and source-code
    cross = function (vector) {
	var B = vector.elements || vector;
	if (this.elements.length != 3 || B.length != 3) { return null; }
	var A = this.elements;
	return Vector.create([
	    (A[1] * B[2]) - (A[2] * B[1]),
	    (A[2] * B[0]) - (A[0] * B[2]),
	    (A[0] * B[1]) - (A[1] * B[0])
	]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dimensions ()

  • description and source-code
    dimensions = function () {
  return {rows: 1, cols: this.elements.length};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.distanceFrom (obj)

  • description and source-code
    distanceFrom = function (obj) {
	if (obj.anchor || (obj.start && obj.end)) { return obj.distanceFrom(this); }
	var V = obj.elements || obj;
	if (V.length != this.elements.length) { return null; }
	var sum = 0, part;
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    part = x - V[i - 1];
	    sum += part * part;
	});
	return Math.sqrt(sum);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.div (item)

  • description and source-code
    div = function (item) {
    if (typeof item == 'number') {
        return this.map(function (v, i) {
            return v / item;
        });
    }
    else {
        return this.elementDivide(item);
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dot (vector)

  • description and source-code
    dot = function (vector) {
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	var i, product = 0, n = this.elements.length;	
	if (n != V.length) { return null; }
	while (n--) { product += this.elements[n] * V[n]; }
	return product;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dup ()

  • description and source-code
    dup = function () {
	    return Vector.create(this.elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.e (i)

  • description and source-code
    e = function (i) {
  return (i < 1 || i > this.elements.length) ? null : this.elements[i - 1];
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.each (fn)

  • description and source-code
    each = function (fn) {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    fn(this.elements[i], i + 1);
	}
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.elementDivide (vector)

  • description and source-code
    elementDivide = function (vector) {
	return this.map(function(v, i) {
	    return v / vector.e(i);
	});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.elementMultiply (v)

  • description and source-code
    elementMultiply = function (v) {
	return this.map(function(k, i) {
	    return v.e(i) * k;
	});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.eql (vector)

  • description and source-code
    eql = function (vector) {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	if (n != V.length) { return false; }
	while (n--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[n] - V[n]) > Sylvester.precision) { return false; }
	}
	return true;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.indexOf (x)

  • description and source-code
    indexOf = function (x) {
	var index = null, n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    if (index === null && this.elements[i] == x) {
		index = i + 1;
	    }
	}
	return index;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.inspect ()

  • description and source-code
    inspect = function () {
	return '[' + this.elements.join(', ') + ']';
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.isAntiparallelTo (vector)

  • description and source-code
    isAntiparallelTo = function (vector) {
	var angle = this.angleFrom(vector);
	return (angle === null) ? null : (Math.abs(angle - Math.PI) <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    isParallelTo = function (vector) {
	var angle = this.angleFrom(vector);
	return (angle === null) ? null : (angle <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    isPerpendicularTo = function (vector) {
	var dot = this.dot(vector);
	return (dot === null) ? null : (Math.abs(dot) <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage

	return Vector.log(this);

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.map (fn)

  • description and source-code
    map = function (fn) {
	var elements = [];
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    elements.push(fn(x, i));
	});
	return Vector.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.max ()

  • description and source-code
    max = function () {
	var m = 0, i = this.elements.length;
	while (i--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[i]) > Math.abs(m)) { m = this.elements[i]; }
	}
	return m;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.maxIndex ()

  • description and source-code
    maxIndex = function () {
	var m = 0, i = this.elements.length;
	var maxIndex = -1;

	while (i--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[i]) > Math.abs(m)) {
		m = this.elements[i];
		maxIndex = i + 1;
	    }
	}

	return maxIndex;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.modulus ()

  • description and source-code
    modulus = function () {
  return Math.sqrt(this.dot(this));
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.multiply (k)

  • description and source-code
    multiply = function (k) {
	return this.map(function(x) { return x * k; });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.norm ()

  • description and source-code
    norm = function () {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	var sum = 0;

	while (n--) {
	    sum += Math.pow(this.elements[n], 2);
	}

	return Math.sqrt(sum);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.product ()

  • description and source-code
    product = function () {
	var p = 1;

	this.map(function(v) {
	    p *= v;
	});

	return p;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.reflectionIn (obj)

  • description and source-code
    reflectionIn = function (obj) {
	if (obj.anchor) {
	    // obj is a plane or line
	    var P = this.elements.slice();
	    var C = obj.pointClosestTo(P).elements;
	    return Vector.create([C[0] + (C[0] - P[0]), C[1] + (C[1] - P[1]), C[2] + (C[2] - (P[2] || 0))]);
	} else {
	    // obj is a point
	    var Q = obj.elements || obj;
	    if (this.elements.length != Q.length) { return null; }
	    return this.map(function(x, i) { return Q[i - 1] + (Q[i - 1] - x); });
	}
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.reshape (r, c)

  • description and source-code
    reshape = function (r, c) {
    return Matrix.reshape(this.elements, r, c);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.rotate (t, obj)

  • description and source-code
    rotate = function (t, obj) {
	var V, R = null, x, y, z;
	if (t.determinant) { R = t.elements; }
	switch (this.elements.length) {
	case 2:
        V = obj.elements || obj;
        if (V.length != 2) { return null; }
        if (!R) { R = Matrix.Rotation(t).elements; }
        x = this.elements[0] - V[0];
        y = this.elements[1] - V[1];
        return Vector.create([
		V[0] + R[0][0] * x + R[0][1] * y,
		V[1] + R[1][0] * x + R[1][1] * y
        ]);
        break;
	case 3:
        if (!obj.direction) { return null; }
        var C = obj.pointClosestTo(this).elements;
        if (!R) { R = Matrix.Rotation(t, obj.direction).elements; }
        x = this.elements[0] - C[0];
        y = this.elements[1] - C[1];
        z = this.elements[2] - C[2];
        return Vector.create([
		C[0] + R[0][0] * x + R[0][1] * y + R[0][2] * z,
		C[1] + R[1][0] * x + R[1][1] * y + R[1][2] * z,
		C[2] + R[2][0] * x + R[2][1] * y + R[2][2] * z
        ]);
        break;
	default:
        return null;
	}
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.round ()

  • description and source-code
    round = function () {
	return this.map(function(x) { return Math.round(x); });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.rows ()

  • description and source-code
    rows = function () {
  return 1;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.setElements (els)

  • description and source-code
    setElements = function (els) {
	this.elements = (els.elements || els).slice();
	return this;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.snapTo (x)

  • description and source-code
    snapTo = function (x) {
	return this.map(function(y) {
	    return (Math.abs(y - x) <= Sylvester.precision) ? x : y;
	});
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.subtract (v)

  • description and source-code
    subtract = function (v) {
	if (typeof(v) == 'number')
	    return this.map(function(k) { return k - v; });

	var V = v.elements || v;
	if (this.elements.length != V.length) { return null; }
	return this.map(function(x, i) { return x - V[i - 1]; });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.sum ()

  • description and source-code
    sum = function () {
	var sum = 0;
	this.map(function(x) { sum += x;});
	return sum;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.to3D ()

  • description and source-code
    to3D = function () {
	var V = this.dup();
	switch (V.elements.length) {
	case 3: break;
	case 2: V.elements.push(0); break;
	default: return null;
	}
	return V;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.toDiagonalMatrix ()

  • description and source-code
    toDiagonalMatrix = function () {
	return Matrix.Diagonal(this.elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.toUnitVector ()

  • description and source-code
    toUnitVector = function () {
	var r = this.modulus();
	if (r === 0) { return this.dup(); }
	return this.map(function(x) { return x / r; });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.top (n)

  • description and source-code
    top = function (n) {
	var elements = [];

	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    elements.push(this.elements[i]);
	}

	return Vector.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.transpose ()

  • description and source-code
    transpose = function () {
	var rows = this.elements.length;
	var elements = [];

	for (var i = 0; i < rows; i++) {
	    elements.push([this.elements[i]]);
	}
	return Matrix.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.x (k)

  • description and source-code
    x = function (k) { return this.multiply(k); }
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.add

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.add (value)

  • description and source-code
    add = function (value) {
	var V = value.elements || value;

	if (this.elements.length != V.length)
	    return this.map(function(v) { return v + value });
	else
	    return this.map(function(x, i) { return x + V[i - 1]; });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.angleFrom

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.angleFrom (vector)

  • description and source-code
    angleFrom = function (vector) {
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	var n = this.elements.length, k = n, i;
	if (n != V.length) { return null; }
	var dot = 0, mod1 = 0, mod2 = 0;
	// Work things out in parallel to save time
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    dot += x * V[i - 1];
	    mod1 += x * x;
	    mod2 += V[i - 1] * V[i - 1];
	});
	mod1 = Math.sqrt(mod1); mod2 = Math.sqrt(mod2);
	if (mod1 * mod2 === 0) { return null; }
	var theta = dot / (mod1 * mod2);
	if (theta < -1) { theta = -1; }
	if (theta > 1) { theta = 1; }
	return Math.acos(theta);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.augment

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.augment (elements)

  • description and source-code
    augment = function (elements) {
	var newElements = this.elements;

	for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
	    newElements.push(elements[i]);
	}

	return Vector.create(newElements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.chomp

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.chomp (n)

  • description and source-code
    chomp = function (n) {
	var elements = [];

	for (var i = n; i < this.elements.length; i++) {
	    elements.push(this.elements[i]);
	}

	return Vector.create(elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.cols

  • description and source-code
    cols = function () {
  return this.elements.length;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.cross

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.cross (vector)

  • description and source-code
    cross = function (vector) {
	var B = vector.elements || vector;
	if (this.elements.length != 3 || B.length != 3) { return null; }
	var A = this.elements;
	return Vector.create([
	    (A[1] * B[2]) - (A[2] * B[1]),
	    (A[2] * B[0]) - (A[0] * B[2]),
	    (A[0] * B[1]) - (A[1] * B[0])
	]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.dimensions

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dimensions ()

  • description and source-code
    dimensions = function () {
  return {rows: 1, cols: this.elements.length};
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.distanceFrom

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.distanceFrom (obj)

  • description and source-code
    distanceFrom = function (obj) {
	if (obj.anchor || (obj.start && obj.end)) { return obj.distanceFrom(this); }
	var V = obj.elements || obj;
	if (V.length != this.elements.length) { return null; }
	var sum = 0, part;
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    part = x - V[i - 1];
	    sum += part * part;
	});
	return Math.sqrt(sum);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.div

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.div (item)

  • description and source-code
    div = function (item) {
    if (typeof item == 'number') {
        return this.map(function (v, i) {
            return v / item;
        });
    }
    else {
        return this.elementDivide(item);
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.dot

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dot (vector)

  • description and source-code
    dot = function (vector) {
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	var i, product = 0, n = this.elements.length;	
	if (n != V.length) { return null; }
	while (n--) { product += this.elements[n] * V[n]; }
	return product;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.dup ()

  • description and source-code
    dup = function () {
	    return Vector.create(this.elements);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.e

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.e (i)

  • description and source-code
    e = function (i) {
  return (i < 1 || i > this.elements.length) ? null : this.elements[i - 1];
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.each (fn)

  • description and source-code
    each = function (fn) {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    fn(this.elements[i], i + 1);
	}
}
  • example usage

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.elementDivide (vector)

  • description and source-code
    elementDivide = function (vector) {
	return this.map(function(v, i) {
	    return v / vector.e(i);
	});
}

    elementMultiply = function (v) {
	return this.map(function(k, i) {
	    return v.e(i) * k;
	});
}
  • example usage

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.eql

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.eql (vector)

  • description and source-code
    eql = function (vector) {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	var V = vector.elements || vector;
	if (n != V.length) { return false; }
	while (n--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[n] - V[n]) > Sylvester.precision) { return false; }
	}
	return true;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.indexOf

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.indexOf (x)

  • description and source-code
    indexOf = function (x) {
	var index = null, n = this.elements.length;
	for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
	    if (index === null && this.elements[i] == x) {
		index = i + 1;
	    }
	}
	return index;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.inspect ()

  • description and source-code
    inspect = function () {
	return '[' + this.elements.join(', ') + ']';
}
  • example usage

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.isAntiparallelTo

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.isAntiparallelTo (vector)

  • description and source-code
    isAntiparallelTo = function (vector) {
	var angle = this.angleFrom(vector);
	return (angle === null) ? null : (Math.abs(angle - Math.PI) <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    isParallelTo = function (vector) {
	var angle = this.angleFrom(vector);
	return (angle === null) ? null : (angle <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.isPerpendicularTo

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.isPerpendicularTo (vector)

  • description and source-code
    isPerpendicularTo = function (vector) {
	var dot = this.dot(vector);
	return (dot === null) ? null : (Math.abs(dot) <= Sylvester.precision);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.map

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.map (fn)

  • description and source-code
    map = function (fn) {
	var elements = [];
	this.each(function(x, i) {
	    elements.push(fn(x, i));
	});
	return Vector.create(elements);
}
  • example usage

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.max

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.max ()

  • description and source-code
    max = function () {
	var m = 0, i = this.elements.length;
	while (i--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[i]) > Math.abs(m)) { m = this.elements[i]; }
	}
	return m;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.maxIndex

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.maxIndex ()

  • description and source-code
    maxIndex = function () {
	var m = 0, i = this.elements.length;
	var maxIndex = -1;

	while (i--) {
	    if (Math.abs(this.elements[i]) > Math.abs(m)) {
		m = this.elements[i];
		maxIndex = i + 1;
	    }
	}

	return maxIndex;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

  • description and source-code
    modulus = function () {
  return Math.sqrt(this.dot(this));
}

	return this.map(function(x) { return x * k; });
}

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.norm

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.norm ()

  • description and source-code
    norm = function () {
	var n = this.elements.length;
	var sum = 0;

	while (n--) {
	    sum += Math.pow(this.elements[n], 2);
	}

	return Math.sqrt(sum);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

	this.map(function(v) {
	    p *= v;
	});

	return p;
}

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.reflectionIn

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.reflectionIn (obj)

  • description and source-code
    reflectionIn = function (obj) {
	if (obj.anchor) {
	    // obj is a plane or line
	    var P = this.elements.slice();
	    var C = obj.pointClosestTo(P).elements;
	    return Vector.create([C[0] + (C[0] - P[0]), C[1] + (C[1] - P[1]), C[2] + (C[2] - (P[2] || 0))]);
	} else {
	    // obj is a point
	    var Q = obj.elements || obj;
	    if (this.elements.length != Q.length) { return null; }
	    return this.map(function(x, i) { return Q[i - 1] + (Q[i - 1] - x); });
	}
}

    return Matrix.reshape(this.elements, r, c);

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.rotate

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.rotate (t, obj)

  • description and source-code
    rotate = function (t, obj) {
	var V, R = null, x, y, z;
	if (t.determinant) { R = t.elements; }
	switch (this.elements.length) {
	case 2:
        V = obj.elements || obj;
        if (V.length != 2) { return null; }
        if (!R) { R = Matrix.Rotation(t).elements; }
        x = this.elements[0] - V[0];
        y = this.elements[1] - V[1];
        return Vector.create([
		V[0] + R[0][0] * x + R[0][1] * y,
		V[1] + R[1][0] * x + R[1][1] * y
        ]);
        break;
	case 3:
        if (!obj.direction) { return null; }
        var C = obj.pointClosestTo(this).elements;
        if (!R) { R = Matrix.Rotation(t, obj.direction).elements; }
        x = this.elements[0] - C[0];
        y = this.elements[1] - C[1];
        z = this.elements[2] - C[2];
        return Vector.create([
		C[0] + R[0][0] * x + R[0][1] * y + R[0][2] * z,
		C[1] + R[1][0] * x + R[1][1] * y + R[1][2] * z,
		C[2] + R[2][0] * x + R[2][1] * y + R[2][2] * z
        ]);
        break;
	default:
        return null;
	}
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.math.Vector.prototype.round

function salient.math.Vector.prototype.round ()

  • description and source-code
    round = function () {
	return this.map(function(x) { return Math.round(x); });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

	    return this.map(function(k) { return k - v; });

	var V = v.elements || v;
	if (this.elements.length != V.length) { return null; }
	return this.map(function(x, i) { return x - V[i - 1]; });
}

  • description and source-code
    transpose = function () {
	var rows = this.elements.length;
	var elements = [];

	for (var i = 0; i < rows; i++) {
	    elements.push([this.elements[i]]);
	}
	return Matrix.create(elements);
}

module salient.neuralnetworks

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork (options)

  • description and source-code
    NeuralNetwork = function (options) {
    var options = options || {};
    this.examples = [];
    this.outputs = [];
    this.labels = [];
    this.features = null;
    this.outputVector = null;
    this.iterations = options.iterations || 100;
    this.alpha = options.alpha || 0.03;
    this.lambda = (options.lambda || 0.3);
    this.normalizer = options.normalizer || new SimpleNormalizer();
    this.layers = options.layers || [ 25 ]; // array of units per layer
    this.epsilon = options.epsilon || 0.13;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork (options)

  • description and source-code
    NeuralNetwork = function (options) {
    var options = options || {};
    this.examples = [];
    this.outputs = [];
    this.labels = [];
    this.features = null;
    this.outputVector = null;
    this.iterations = options.iterations || 100;
    this.alpha = options.alpha || 0.03;
    this.lambda = (options.lambda || 0.3);
    this.normalizer = options.normalizer || new SimpleNormalizer();
    this.layers = options.layers || [ 25 ]; // array of units per layer
    this.epsilon = options.epsilon || 0.13;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    function Classifier() {
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.addExample (input, label)

  • description and source-code
    addExample = function (input, label) {
    this.examples.push(input);
    if (this.labels.indexOf(label) < 0) {
        this.labels.push(label);
    }

    this.outputs.push([this.labels.indexOf(label) + 1]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.backpropagate (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    backpropagate = function (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda) {
    var output = this.feedForward(ThetaLD, X, true);
    var layers = ThetaLD.length;
    var ThetaGrad = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < layers; l++) {
        var thetaLDimensions = ThetaLD[l].dimensions();
        ThetaGrad.push(Matrix.Zeros(thetaLDimensions.rows, thetaLDimensions.cols));
    }

    var prediction = output[output.length - 1].a;
    var deltaOutput = prediction.subtract(this.mappedOutputMatrix);
    for (var l = layers - 1; l >= 0; l--) {
        var thetaL = ThetaLD[l];
        var thetaGrad = ThetaGrad[l];
        var activationMinus1 = l == 0 ? X : output[l-1].a;

        // gradient function in the next few lines
        var m = deltaOutput.rows();
        for (var i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
            var activeDelta = $M(deltaOutput.row(i)).multiply($M(activationMinus1.row(i)).transpose());
            thetaGrad = thetaGrad.add(activeDelta);
        }
        //var activatedDelta = deltaOutput.transpose().multiply(activationMinus1);
        //thetaGrad = thetaGrad.add(activatedDelta);
        ThetaGrad[l] = thetaGrad;

        // Calculate the propagated weight using the previous delta output
        var weightedErrorL = deltaOutput.multiply(thetaL);

        // Using the current layer - 1 weighted input values,
        // we can calculate the distributed error weight using the sigmoid
        if (l == 0)
            break;

        var weightedInputMinus1 = output[l-1].z;
        var augmentWeightedInputMinus1 = Matrix.Ones(weightedInputMinus1.rows(), 1).augment(weightedInputMinus1.sigmoidGradient());
        deltaOutput = weightedErrorL.elementMultiply(augmentWeightedInputMinus1);
        deltaOutput = deltaOutput.slice(1, deltaOutput.rows(), 2, deltaOutput.cols());
    }

    var m = X.rows();
    for (var i = 0; i < ThetaGrad.length; i++) {
        var grad = ThetaGrad[i];
        grad = grad.div(m);
        var dim = grad.dimensions();
        var gradAugment = Matrix.Zeros(dim.rows, 1).augment(grad.slice(1, dim.rows, 2, dim.cols));
        var adjust = lambda / m;
        grad = grad.add(gradAugment.multiply(adjust));
        ThetaGrad[i] = grad;
    }

    return ThetaGrad;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.calculate (ThetaLD, input)

  • description and source-code
    calculate = function (ThetaLD, input) {
    // Determine if the input is a matrix, an array or a vector
    if (input.length > 0) {
        return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, $M(input).transpose());
    }
    else if (input.elements) {
        if (input.elements[0][0]) {
            return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, input);
        }
        else {
            return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, $M(input.elements).transpose());
        }
    }
    else {
        throw new Error('invalid input parameter, must provide element array, matrix or vector');
        return;
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.computeCost (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    computeCost = function (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda) {
    var activatedOutput = this.feedForward(ThetaLD, X);
    var cost = 0;
    var m = X.dimensions().rows;
    for (var k = 1; k <= this.labels.length; k++) {
        var labelKActivation = $M(activatedOutput.col(k));
        var yk = y.map(function (x, i) { return x == k ? 1 : 0; });
        var prob1 = labelKActivation.log().transpose().multiply(yk).e(1,1);
        var prob0 = labelKActivation.multiply(-1).add(1).log().transpose()
                                    .multiply((yk.multiply(-1).add(1))).e(1,1);
        cost += (-1.0 * (prob1 + prob0)) / m;
    }
    if (lambda) {
        var lambdaCost = 0;
        for (var l = 0; l < ThetaLD.length; l++) {
            var thetaL = ThetaLD[l];
            lambdaCost += thetaL.map(function (x) { return x * x }).sum();
        }
        cost += (lambda / (2 * m)) * lambdaCost;
    }
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.feedForward (ThetaLD, X, includePropagation)

  • description and source-code
    feedForward = function (ThetaLD, X, includePropagation) {
    var layers = ThetaLD.length;
    var input = X;
    var output = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < layers; l++) {
        // obtain the weights in layer l
        var layerThetaM = ThetaLD[l];
        var weightedInputLayerL = input.multiply(layerThetaM.transpose());
        input = Matrix.sigmoid(weightedInputLayerL);

        // Modify the input to include the bias unit on each hidden layer
        if (l < layers - 1) {
            var dimensions = input.dimensions();
            var m = dimensions.rows;
            input = Matrix.Ones(m, 1).augment(input);
        }

        // Push the propagated values into the output if specified
        if (includePropagation) {
            output.push({ 'z': weightedInputLayerL, 'a': input });
        }
    }

    if (includePropagation) {
        return output;
    }
    else {
        return input;
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.getClassifications (input)

  • description and source-code
    getClassifications = function (input) {
    if (!this.trainedTheta) {
        throw new Error('must train the classifier first');
        return;
    }

    var result = this.calculate(this.trainedTheta, input);
    var labels = [];
    for (var k = 0; k < this.labels.length; k++) {
        labels.push({ label: this.labels[k], value: result.e(1, k+1) });
    }

    return labels.sort(function (x, y) { return y.value > x.value });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.gradientDescent (ThetaLD, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    gradientDescent = function (ThetaLD, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda) {
    var history = [];
    var m = X.rows();

    for (var i = 0; i < iterations; i++) {
        var thetaLDResult = this.backpropagate(ThetaLD, X, y, lambda);
        for (var l = 0; l < thetaLDResult.length; l++) {
            thetaLDResult[l] = ThetaLD[l].add(thetaLDResult[l].multiply(-1 * alpha));
        }
        ThetaLD = thetaLDResult;
        history.push(this.computeCost(ThetaLD, X, y, lambda));
    }

    var error = this.computeCost(ThetaLD, X, y);
    return { 'theta': ThetaLD, 'cost': history, 'error': error };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.normalize ()

  • description and source-code
    normalize = function () {
    this.features = this.normalizer.normalize(this.examples);
    this.outputVector = $M(this.outputs);
    this.identityLabels = Matrix.I(this.labels.length);
    var m = this.outputs.length;
    var mappedOutput = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        var ithActualValue = this.outputs[i][0];
        var ithOutputVector = this.identityLabels.row(ithActualValue);
        mappedOutput.push(ithOutputVector.elements);
    }

    this.mappedOutputMatrix = $M(mappedOutput);
    return this.features;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.normalizeInput (input)

  • description and source-code
    normalizeInput = function (input) {
    return this.normalizer.normalizeInput(input);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.randomInitialize (r, c)

  • description and source-code
    randomInitialize = function (r, c) {
    return Matrix.Random(r, c).multiply(2 * this.epsilon).subtract(this.epsilon);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.test (samples, output)

  • description and source-code
    test = function (samples, output) {
    var features = this.normalizer.normalize(samples);
    var outputVector = $M(output);
    var cost = this.computeCost(this.trainedTheta, features, outputVector);
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.train ()

  • description and source-code
    train = function () {
    if (!this.features) {
        this.normalize();
    }

    // Initialize theta to a random set of weights to start from
    var dim = this.features.dimensions();
    var inputConnections = dim.cols;
    var thetaLD = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < this.layers.length; l++) {
        var outputConnections = this.layers[l];
        thetaLD.push(this.randomInitialize(outputConnections, inputConnections));
        inputConnections = outputConnections + 1;
    }
    thetaLD.push(this.randomInitialize(this.labels.length, inputConnections));

    // Setup the gradient descent algorithm to run
    var result = this.gradientDescent(thetaLD, this.features, this.outputVector,
                    this.alpha, this.iterations, this.lambda);
    this.trainedTheta = result.theta;
    return result;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.addExample

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.addExample (input, label)

  • description and source-code
    addExample = function (input, label) {
    this.examples.push(input);
    if (this.labels.indexOf(label) < 0) {
        this.labels.push(label);
    }

    this.outputs.push([this.labels.indexOf(label) + 1]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.backpropagate

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.backpropagate (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    backpropagate = function (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda) {
    var output = this.feedForward(ThetaLD, X, true);
    var layers = ThetaLD.length;
    var ThetaGrad = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < layers; l++) {
        var thetaLDimensions = ThetaLD[l].dimensions();
        ThetaGrad.push(Matrix.Zeros(thetaLDimensions.rows, thetaLDimensions.cols));
    }

    var prediction = output[output.length - 1].a;
    var deltaOutput = prediction.subtract(this.mappedOutputMatrix);
    for (var l = layers - 1; l >= 0; l--) {
        var thetaL = ThetaLD[l];
        var thetaGrad = ThetaGrad[l];
        var activationMinus1 = l == 0 ? X : output[l-1].a;

        // gradient function in the next few lines
        var m = deltaOutput.rows();
        for (var i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
            var activeDelta = $M(deltaOutput.row(i)).multiply($M(activationMinus1.row(i)).transpose());
            thetaGrad = thetaGrad.add(activeDelta);
        }
        //var activatedDelta = deltaOutput.transpose().multiply(activationMinus1);
        //thetaGrad = thetaGrad.add(activatedDelta);
        ThetaGrad[l] = thetaGrad;

        // Calculate the propagated weight using the previous delta output
        var weightedErrorL = deltaOutput.multiply(thetaL);

        // Using the current layer - 1 weighted input values,
        // we can calculate the distributed error weight using the sigmoid
        if (l == 0)
            break;

        var weightedInputMinus1 = output[l-1].z;
        var augmentWeightedInputMinus1 = Matrix.Ones(weightedInputMinus1.rows(), 1).augment(weightedInputMinus1.sigmoidGradient());
        deltaOutput = weightedErrorL.elementMultiply(augmentWeightedInputMinus1);
        deltaOutput = deltaOutput.slice(1, deltaOutput.rows(), 2, deltaOutput.cols());
    }

    var m = X.rows();
    for (var i = 0; i < ThetaGrad.length; i++) {
        var grad = ThetaGrad[i];
        grad = grad.div(m);
        var dim = grad.dimensions();
        var gradAugment = Matrix.Zeros(dim.rows, 1).augment(grad.slice(1, dim.rows, 2, dim.cols));
        var adjust = lambda / m;
        grad = grad.add(gradAugment.multiply(adjust));
        ThetaGrad[i] = grad;
    }

    return ThetaGrad;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.calculate

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.calculate (ThetaLD, input)

  • description and source-code
    calculate = function (ThetaLD, input) {
    // Determine if the input is a matrix, an array or a vector
    if (input.length > 0) {
        return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, $M(input).transpose());
    }
    else if (input.elements) {
        if (input.elements[0][0]) {
            return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, input);
        }
        else {
            return this.feedForward(ThetaLD, $M(input.elements).transpose());
        }
    }
    else {
        throw new Error('invalid input parameter, must provide element array, matrix or vector');
        return;
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.computeCost

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.computeCost (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    computeCost = function (ThetaLD, X, y, lambda) {
    var activatedOutput = this.feedForward(ThetaLD, X);
    var cost = 0;
    var m = X.dimensions().rows;
    for (var k = 1; k <= this.labels.length; k++) {
        var labelKActivation = $M(activatedOutput.col(k));
        var yk = y.map(function (x, i) { return x == k ? 1 : 0; });
        var prob1 = labelKActivation.log().transpose().multiply(yk).e(1,1);
        var prob0 = labelKActivation.multiply(-1).add(1).log().transpose()
                                    .multiply((yk.multiply(-1).add(1))).e(1,1);
        cost += (-1.0 * (prob1 + prob0)) / m;
    }
    if (lambda) {
        var lambdaCost = 0;
        for (var l = 0; l < ThetaLD.length; l++) {
            var thetaL = ThetaLD[l];
            lambdaCost += thetaL.map(function (x) { return x * x }).sum();
        }
        cost += (lambda / (2 * m)) * lambdaCost;
    }
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.feedForward

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.feedForward (ThetaLD, X, includePropagation)

  • description and source-code
    feedForward = function (ThetaLD, X, includePropagation) {
    var layers = ThetaLD.length;
    var input = X;
    var output = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < layers; l++) {
        // obtain the weights in layer l
        var layerThetaM = ThetaLD[l];
        var weightedInputLayerL = input.multiply(layerThetaM.transpose());
        input = Matrix.sigmoid(weightedInputLayerL);

        // Modify the input to include the bias unit on each hidden layer
        if (l < layers - 1) {
            var dimensions = input.dimensions();
            var m = dimensions.rows;
            input = Matrix.Ones(m, 1).augment(input);
        }

        // Push the propagated values into the output if specified
        if (includePropagation) {
            output.push({ 'z': weightedInputLayerL, 'a': input });
        }
    }

    if (includePropagation) {
        return output;
    }
    else {
        return input;
    }
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.getClassifications

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.getClassifications (input)

  • description and source-code
    getClassifications = function (input) {
    if (!this.trainedTheta) {
        throw new Error('must train the classifier first');
        return;
    }

    var result = this.calculate(this.trainedTheta, input);
    var labels = [];
    for (var k = 0; k < this.labels.length; k++) {
        labels.push({ label: this.labels[k], value: result.e(1, k+1) });
    }

    return labels.sort(function (x, y) { return y.value > x.value });
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.gradientDescent

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.gradientDescent (ThetaLD, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    gradientDescent = function (ThetaLD, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda) {
    var history = [];
    var m = X.rows();

    for (var i = 0; i < iterations; i++) {
        var thetaLDResult = this.backpropagate(ThetaLD, X, y, lambda);
        for (var l = 0; l < thetaLDResult.length; l++) {
            thetaLDResult[l] = ThetaLD[l].add(thetaLDResult[l].multiply(-1 * alpha));
        }
        ThetaLD = thetaLDResult;
        history.push(this.computeCost(ThetaLD, X, y, lambda));
    }

    var error = this.computeCost(ThetaLD, X, y);
    return { 'theta': ThetaLD, 'cost': history, 'error': error };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.normalize

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.normalize ()

  • description and source-code
    normalize = function () {
    this.features = this.normalizer.normalize(this.examples);
    this.outputVector = $M(this.outputs);
    this.identityLabels = Matrix.I(this.labels.length);
    var m = this.outputs.length;
    var mappedOutput = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        var ithActualValue = this.outputs[i][0];
        var ithOutputVector = this.identityLabels.row(ithActualValue);
        mappedOutput.push(ithOutputVector.elements);
    }

    this.mappedOutputMatrix = $M(mappedOutput);
    return this.features;
}

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.test

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.test (samples, output)

  • description and source-code
    test = function (samples, output) {
    var features = this.normalizer.normalize(samples);
    var outputVector = $M(output);
    var cost = this.computeCost(this.trainedTheta, features, outputVector);
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.train

function salient.neuralnetworks.NeuralNetwork.prototype.train ()

  • description and source-code
    train = function () {
    if (!this.features) {
        this.normalize();
    }

    // Initialize theta to a random set of weights to start from
    var dim = this.features.dimensions();
    var inputConnections = dim.cols;
    var thetaLD = [];
    for (var l = 0; l < this.layers.length; l++) {
        var outputConnections = this.layers[l];
        thetaLD.push(this.randomInitialize(outputConnections, inputConnections));
        inputConnections = outputConnections + 1;
    }
    thetaLD.push(this.randomInitialize(this.labels.length, inputConnections));

    // Setup the gradient descent algorithm to run
    var result = this.gradientDescent(thetaLD, this.features, this.outputVector,
                    this.alpha, this.iterations, this.lambda);
    this.trainedTheta = result.theta;
    return result;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.normalizers

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer (options)

  • description and source-code
    MeanNormalizer = function (options) {
    this.normalizeFeature0 = true;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer (options)

  • description and source-code
    MeanNormalizer = function (options) {
    this.normalizeFeature0 = true;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalize (observations)

  • description and source-code
    normalize = function (observations) {
    var features = $M(observations);

    var dim = features.dimensions();
    var m = dim.rows;
    var n = dim.cols;
    var mu = Matrix.Zeros(1, n);
    var sigma = Matrix.Zeros(1, n);

    this.mu = features.mean();
    this.sigma = features.std();
    var elements = [];
    if (this.normalizeFeature0) {
        var feature0 = Vector.One(m);
        elements.push(feature0.elements);
    }

    for (var i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        var r = features.col(i).subtract(this.mu.e(i)).div(this.sigma.e(i));
        elements.push(r.elements);
    }

    return $M(elements).transpose();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalizeInput (observation)

  • description and source-code
    normalizeInput = function (observation) {
    var inputNorm = [];
    if (this.normalizeFeature0) {
        inputNorm.push(1);
    }

    for (var i = 1; i <= observation.length; i++) {
        inputNorm.push((observation[i-1] - this.mu.e(i)) / this.sigma.e(i));
    }

    return $V(inputNorm);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalize

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalize (observations)

  • description and source-code
    normalize = function (observations) {
    var features = $M(observations);

    var dim = features.dimensions();
    var m = dim.rows;
    var n = dim.cols;
    var mu = Matrix.Zeros(1, n);
    var sigma = Matrix.Zeros(1, n);

    this.mu = features.mean();
    this.sigma = features.std();
    var elements = [];
    if (this.normalizeFeature0) {
        var feature0 = Vector.One(m);
        elements.push(feature0.elements);
    }

    for (var i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        var r = features.col(i).subtract(this.mu.e(i)).div(this.sigma.e(i));
        elements.push(r.elements);
    }

    return $M(elements).transpose();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalizeInput

function salient.normalizers.MeanNormalizer.prototype.normalizeInput (observation)

  • description and source-code
    normalizeInput = function (observation) {
    var inputNorm = [];
    if (this.normalizeFeature0) {
        inputNorm.push(1);
    }

    for (var i = 1; i <= observation.length; i++) {
        inputNorm.push((observation[i-1] - this.mu.e(i)) / this.sigma.e(i));
    }

    return $V(inputNorm);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression

function salient.regression.LinearRegression (options)

  • description and source-code
    LinearRegression = function (options) {
    var options = options || {};
    this.examples = [];
    this.outputs = [];
    this.features = null;
    this.outputVector = null;
    this.iterations = options.iterations || 1500;
    this.alpha = options.alpha || 0.03;
    this.regularization = options.regularization || false;
    this.lambda = (options.lambda || 1) * (this.regularization ? 1 : 0);
    this.normalizer = options.normalizer || new MeanNormalizer();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression

function salient.regression.LinearRegression (options)

  • description and source-code
    LinearRegression = function (options) {
    var options = options || {};
    this.examples = [];
    this.outputs = [];
    this.features = null;
    this.outputVector = null;
    this.iterations = options.iterations || 1500;
    this.alpha = options.alpha || 0.03;
    this.regularization = options.regularization || false;
    this.lambda = (options.lambda || 1) * (this.regularization ? 1 : 0);
    this.normalizer = options.normalizer || new MeanNormalizer();
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.super_ ()

  • description and source-code
    super_ = function () {
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.addExample (input, output)

  • description and source-code
    addExample = function (input, output) {
    this.examples.push(input);
    this.outputs.push([output]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.calculate (theta, input)

  • description and source-code
    calculate = function (theta, input) {
    return theta.transpose().multiply(input);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.computeCost (theta, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    computeCost = function (theta, X, y, lambda) {
    var m = X.rows();
    var n = X.cols();
    var result = X.multiply(theta).subtract(y);
    var cost = result.transpose().multiply(result).div(2 * m).e(1, 1);
    if (lambda) {
        cost += Matrix.Diagonal(theta.elements)
                .multiply(lambda).transpose()
                .multiply(theta).div(2 * m).e(1,1);
    }
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.gradientDescent (theta, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    gradientDescent = function (theta, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda) {
    var m = X.rows();
    var history = [];

    for (var i = 0; i < iterations; i++) {
        var result = X.multiply(theta).subtract(y)
                      .transpose().multiply(X).div(m);
        if (lambda) {
            var lambdaAdjust = lambda.multiply(-1 * alpha).div(m).add(1);
            var thetaAdjust = Matrix.Diagonal(theta.elements).multiply(lambdaAdjust);
            theta = thetaAdjust.subtract(result.multiply(alpha).transpose());
        }
        else {
            theta = theta.subtract(result.multiply(alpha).transpose());
        }
        history.push(this.computeCost(theta, X, y, lambda));
    }

    var error = this.computeCost(theta, X, y);
    return { 'theta': theta, 'cost': history, 'error': error };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.normalize ()

  • description and source-code
    normalize = function () {
    this.features = this.normalizer.normalize(this.examples);
    this.outputVector = $M(this.outputs);
    return this.features;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.normalizeInput (input)

  • description and source-code
    normalizeInput = function (input) {
    return this.normalizer.normalizeInput(input);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.test (samples, output)

  • description and source-code
    test = function (samples, output) {
    var features = this.normalizer.normalize(samples);
    var outputVector = $M(output);
    var cost = this.computeCost(this.trainedTheta, features, outputVector);
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.train ()

  • description and source-code
    train = function () {
    if (!this.features) {
        this.normalize();
    }

    var dim = this.features.dimensions();
    var n = dim.cols;

    var theta = Matrix.Zeros(n, 1);
    var l = [];
    l.push([0]);
    for (var i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        l.push([this.lambda]);
    }
    var lambdaV = $M(l);
    var X = this.features;
    var y = this.outputVector;
    var alpha = this.alpha;
    var iterations = this.iterations;
    var result = this.gradientDescent(theta, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambdaV);
    this.trainedTheta = result.theta;
    return result;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.addExample

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.addExample (input, output)

  • description and source-code
    addExample = function (input, output) {
    this.examples.push(input);
    this.outputs.push([output]);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.calculate

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.calculate (theta, input)

  • description and source-code
    calculate = function (theta, input) {
    return theta.transpose().multiply(input);
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.computeCost

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.computeCost (theta, X, y, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    computeCost = function (theta, X, y, lambda) {
    var m = X.rows();
    var n = X.cols();
    var result = X.multiply(theta).subtract(y);
    var cost = result.transpose().multiply(result).div(2 * m).e(1, 1);
    if (lambda) {
        cost += Matrix.Diagonal(theta.elements)
                .multiply(lambda).transpose()
                .multiply(theta).div(2 * m).e(1,1);
    }
    return cost;
}
  • example usage
    n/a

module salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.gradientDescent

function salient.regression.LinearRegression.prototype.gradientDescent (theta, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda)

  • description and source-code
    gradientDescent = function (theta, X, y, alpha, iterations, lambda) {
    var m = X.rows();
    var history = [];

    for (var i = 0; i < iterations; i++) {
        var result = X.multiply(theta).subtract(y)
                      .transpose().multiply(X).div(m);
        if (lambda) {
            var lambdaAdjust = lambda.multiply(-1 * alpha).div(m).add(1);
            var thetaAdjust = Matrix.Diagonal(theta.elements).multiply(lambdaAdjust);
            theta = thetaAdjust.subtract(result.multiply(alpha).transpose());
        }
        else {
            theta = theta.subtract(result.multiply(alpha).transpose());
        }
        history.push(this.computeCost(theta, X, y, lambda));
    }

    var error = this.computeCost(theta, X, y);
    return { 'theta': theta, 'cost': history, 'error': error };
}
  • example usage
    n/a

    var cost = this.computeCost(this.trainedTheta, features, outputVector);
    return cost;
